title: IsPropertyWriteable (Method)
text:
METHOD IsPropertyWriteable : BOOL
Returns whether the specified BACnet-Property of this BACnet-Object (propID) is client side writeable or only client side readable.
This access restrictions only hold for client side access and not for the functions used in this FB (i.e. SetPropertyInstance).

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment:
The property ID for which the writeability shall be
determined.
